short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension that auto-suggest the medical's spellings when they type in

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Medspell auto suggest is an extension that suggest the related medical words when the user start typing. The extension gives a list of suggested words and user can click any word of their choice to append.
